abstract: Apple announced Monday that the iPhone 4S broke previous sales records for iPhones, saying it processed more than one million orders in the first 24 hours.
snippet: Apple announced Monday that the iPhone 4S broke previous sales records for iPhones, saying it processed more than one million orders in the first 24 hours.
lead_paragraph: It has the repetition of a Hollywood movie script: Apple releases a new product. Some in the media and analysts quickly bemoan the new product, saying it didn't live up to the hype they created.

headline.main: Disappointment? Apple's iPhone 4S Breaks Sales Records
